info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 2:05PM MST until January 16 at 7:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Otero Mesa. In Texas, Northern Hudspeth Highlands/Hueco Mountains, Salt Basin and Southern Hudspeth Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and gloves.. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coldest locations will be in exposed areas where east winds could become gusty at times. Wind chill values will quickly rise after sunrise Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Use caution while outdoors. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
